title: 2008 NBA Finals
summary: The 2008 NBA Finals was the championship series of the National Basketball Association's (NBA) 2007â€“08 NBA season, and the conclusion of the season's playoffs. The Boston Celtics, top-seeded champions of the Eastern Conference, defeated the Los Angeles Lakers, top-seeded champions of the Western Conference, four games to two in a best-of-seven series. This was Boston's first title since 1986 during the Larry Bird era and 17th overall. This series was held from June 5 through June 17, 2008.
